page_header.title: Mezete Hummus
page_header.pacecore: Shelf-stable with an authentic Middle Eastern taste

content.title: Fresh. Innovative. Efficient.
content.message: Pioneered after two decades of intensive research and development, this product’s unique Ultra-High Temperature sterilization allows for this hummus to be stored on a shelf, not in a refrigerator, saving valuable cooler space.

video.title: Sysco Cutting Edge Solutions: Mezete Hummus

section_header.title: Why We Love This
section_header.subtitle: Learn more about this great product
li: Shelf stable – no need to refrigerate before opening
Made with 30% tahini content, 3x that of leading brands, for a rich, nutty flavor with a velvety smooth and creamy texture
This unique UHT sterilization process allows for this hummus to be made with no preservatives, for a fresh, authentic Middle Eastern taste
Available in two flavors, Classic and Roasted Red Pepper, and packed in 2.2-pound pouches or on-the-go packs for grab-and-go convenience

feature_products.message: Roasted Red Pepper Hummus Snack Pack
